          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Angles d'incidence et de réflexion des rayons de lumière  dans des miroirs</string>
            <string language="en">Incidence and reflection angles of light rays in mirrors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnung und Reflexion Winkel der hellen 
Strahlen in den Spiegeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ângulos da incidência e da reflexão de raios 
claros nos espelhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Angoli di riflessione e di incidenza dei raggi 
luminosi in specchi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γωνίες επίπτωσης και αντανάκλασης των ελαφριών 
ακτίνων στους καθρέφτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ángulos de la incidencia y de la reflexión de 
rayos ligeros en espejos</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que les angles  d'incidence et la réflexion des rayons de lumière dans des miroirs sont  égaux.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the angles of incidence and reflection of light rays in mirrors are equal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">incidence angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroirs</string>
            <string language="en">mirrors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle réfléchi</string>
            <string language="en">reflected angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Einfallswinkel 
und Reflexion der hellen Strahlen in den Spiegeln gleich sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os ângulos de 
incidência e de reflexão de raios claros nos espelhos são iguais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che gli angoli 
dell'incidenza e della riflessione dei raggi luminosi in specchi sono 
uguali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι γωνίες της 
πρόσπτωσης και της αντανάκλασης των ελαφριών ακτίνων στους 
καθρέφτες είναι ίσες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los ángulos de la 
incidencia y de la reflexión de rayos ligeros en espejos son iguales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnung Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">reflektierter Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo da incidência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelhos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo refletido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo di incidenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejos</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">ángulo reflejado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión</string>
          </keyword>
